column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : Does the idea that our lives on Earth may be all that there is unsettle you ?
#Text=AD : Yes , sure .
#Text=I think there ’s more .
#Text=I ’m always seeking things of beauty , and my art reflects the search for that .

#Text=DS : You had said in an interview that your family was n’t particularly supportive of your career path , but you are also saying they were atheists who were n’t curious about the things you are curious about .
#Text=It sounds like you were a hothouse flower .
#Text=AD : Yes .
#Text=I think what went with my parents ' atheism was a distrust of the arts as frivolous and extraneous .
#Text=They were very pragmatic .
#Text=DS : They almost sound Soviet Communist .
#Text=AD : Yeah , a little bit [ Laughs ] .
#Text=They had an austere way of living , and my wanting to pursue music as a career was the last straw .
#Text=DS : What ’s your relationship with them now ?
#Text=AD : I do n’t actually speak to my mother and stepfather .
#Text=DS : Why ?
#Text=AD : A lot of reasons , but when I was about 21
#Text=I was fairly certain I wanted to go the music path and they said , “ Fine , then go ! ”
#Text=DS : That ’s the reason you do n’t speak with them ?
#Text=AD : That ’s the main .
#Text=“ Go ahead , do what you want , and have a nice life . ”
#Text=So the music thing cost the relationship with my parents , although I think there may have been some other things that have done it .
#Text=DS : That must be a difficult thing to contend with , that a career would be the basis for a relationship .
#Text=AD : Yes , it ’s strange , but my love of music is perhaps stronger for it because of the sacrifices I have made for it early on .
#Text=I had to fight .
#Text=DS : Would you say in your previous work some of your conflict of dating would have been birthed from how your relationship with your family ?
#Text=How do you see the arc of your work ?
#Text=AD : My songs are sort of therapy for me , so you can trace my personal progress through them [ Laughs ] .
#Text=I think there is some improvement .
#Text=I wrote my first love song the other day , so I think I ’m getting the hang of what relationships are all about .
#Text=I ’m ever grateful for music for being there for me when things were n’t going so well .
#Text=DS : Has the Iraq War affected you as an artist ?
#Text=AD : Not directly , but I do have a few songs that are political .
#Text=One about George Bush and the hypocrisy , but it ’s very indirect ; you would n’t know it was about George Bush .
#Text=DS : How has it affected you personally ?
#Text=AD : I feel sad about it .
#Text=People say my music is sad , but it ’s a therapeutic thing so the war affects me .
